product_name: Nite Ize Figure 9 Carabiner Rope Tightener with 3.5mm Cord - Package of 2
long_description: This small Figure 9 carabiner from Nite Ize is a rope tightener/tensioning tool that conveniently clips to a fixed point for easy connection. Includes 2 x 8ft. of 3.5mm cord. Eliminates the hassle of tying, adjusting and untying knots. Stainless steel spring gate. Rig your tarps, clotheslines, guyline, roof-rack tie-downs and even bear bags. Fits rope sizes: 2mm (1/16 in.) - 5mm (3/16 in.). Instructions are laser-etched on sides. Load limit: 50 lbs. Includes 2 small 'biners and 2 x 8 ft. of 3.5mm cord. Not intended for climbing or load-bearing use.
short_description: This small Figure 9 carabiner from Nite Ize is a rope tightener/tensioning tool that conveniently clips to a fixed point for easy connection. Includes 2 x 8ft. of 3.5mm cord.
